thread.title: The Internet Can't Handle Tourists Being Surprised At The Oscars — Check Out The Most HIGHlarious Reactions!
thread.title_full: The Internet Can't Handle Tourists Being Surprised At The Oscars — Check Out The Most HIGHlarious Reactions!

author: Perez Hilton
title: The Internet Can't Handle Tourists Being Surprised At The Oscars — Check Out The Most HIGHlarious Reactions!
text:
— Aaron Dodson (@aardodson) February 27, 2017 
I hope Gary and his fiancé introduce best picture. #oscars — Morgan Murphy (@morgan_murphy) February 27, 2017 
I wish I could achieve the level of confidence/shamelessness that Gary has. My new hero. #Oscars pic.twitter.com/Wuoo7N2j8y — Sam Roberts (@notsam) February 27, 2017 
When I grow up I wanna be like Gary from Chicago at the #Oscars — Rico Rodriguez (@StarringRico) February 27, 2017 
Gary from Chicago is a star though #Oscars — Nick Hautman (@nickhautman) February 27, 2017 
Gary from Chicago just got himself an ABC pilot. #Oscars — Jared Shipley (@jaredshipley) February 27, 2017 
Dear God, I want to come back as #garyfromchicago , shorts and all. #Oscars @jimmykimmel — Tamron Hall (@tamronhall) February 27, 2017 
What did U think of the segment??   Crossroads : Where Are They Now? View Pics »
